exclusion.criterion: Documented Liver disease, biliary disease (congenital or acquired), hemolytic diseases and history of alcoholism
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Cases revealed other pathology than appendicitis by CT and laparoscopy
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Computed Tomography shows presence of a distended appendix

notes: 31-year-old woman with abdominal pain, leukocytosis, and Alvarado score 5-6. Candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy.
